announcementList.title: Group Project Progress
announcementList.message: Hey everyone I hope you are making good progress on your Alterna-Canvas project! Just a quick reminder that the final turn-in will be this Wednesday. If you have any last minutes questions or concerns feel free to reach out to me or the TA.

announcementList.title: Project 3 Turn-In Extension
announcementList.message: There has been a change of date to Project 3 turn-in. Due to the recent events with our system going down, and the internet having issues, I need to let everyone know that the Project 3 due date has been extended from 20 November to 24 November at 11:59PM.

announcementList.title: Some Helpful Links
announcementList.message: Recently we have been going over matrices and compiling 2-d images. I found some helpful links that came up during the class and wanted to share these with you all. The first one will involve using these to wrap 3-d objects, while the second can simplify vectors.

announcementList.title: Project 3 Updates
announcementList.message: How is everyone feeling about Project 3? I have had multiple students voice concern to me over the recent power outages that have also effected the internet. I do not know if this is connected to the slower than average wi-fi speeds but it seems to be effecting some Students work.

announcementList.title: A++ Work on your Project
announcementList.message: This is the coolest project I have ever seen and I am so impressed by your group! Keep up the awesome work everyone!

announcementList.title: Welcome to Week 12
announcementList.message: Hello everyone and I hope you are having a good week. We will be going through the final two chapters this week leading up to the Final exam. A reminder that this will be at the usual meeting place on Dec 4, 2023 @ 2:00PM. Also I hope everyone is doing well on their final project this semester (Project 3).
